A few have been traded, here are the ones I have still available for trade. 

I am looking to trade for Unopened Sweet Caporal or Piedmont packs with 1909, 1910 or 1911 tax stamps with a proper Dist/Factory designation for T206s. Preferably encapsulated. I will certainly trade in your favor for one of these!


Doyle (throwing) 
Marquard (hands at side)
Livingstone (fielding)
McBride (batting) SGC
McBride (batting) PSA
